title: Gamification-MOOC Integrated Course for Enhancing Higher-Order Thinking Skills in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric access environment combining real-time interaction with self-directed learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply higher-order thinking skills (analysis, evaluation, creativity) to solve scientific problems
Learners actively interact with MOOC content at over 80% engagement by utilizing gamification elements
Learners can improve their thinking processes through at least three iterations using peer feedback and instructor evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
